hero.title: About Dr. Car Cold
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Professional Automotive Refrigerant Supplier

intro.title: Company Introduction
intro.paragraph1: Dr. Car Cold was established in 2015 in Longjing District, Taichung City, as a professional automotive refrigerant and equipment supplier. We are committed to providing high-quality automotive refrigerant products, including R134a, R1234yf eco-friendly refrigerants, as well as various refrigeration oils and professional maintenance equipment.
intro.paragraph2: Over the years, we have adhered to the business philosophy of 'Quality First, Service Supreme' and established long-term stable partnerships with auto repair shops throughout Taiwan. We not only provide quality products but also value after-sales service and technical support to ensure customers receive the most comprehensive service.
intro.paragraph3: With the rise of environmental awareness, we actively introduce new eco-friendly refrigerants to help customers meet environmental regulations. At the same time, we continuously expand our product line to provide more diversified choices to meet different customer needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide the highest quality automotive refrigerant products and professional services, becoming our customers' most trusted partner, and contributing together to environmental protection and sustainable development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the leading brand in Taiwan's automotive refrigerant industry, leading the industry towards a more environmentally friendly and efficient direction with innovative technology and quality service.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: All products undergo strict quality inspection to ensure compliance with international standards

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Complete logistics system ensures rapid product delivery

service.title: Instant Service
service.description: Professional team provides technical support at any time

innovation.title: Innovative Technology
innovation.description: Continuously introducing the latest refrigerant technology and equipment

timeline.title: Development History
timeline.2015: Company established, focusing on automotive refrigerant wholesale business
timeline.2019: Expanded product line, added refrigerant filling equipment
timeline.2023: Became the leading automotive refrigerant supplier in Central Taiwan

cta.subtitle: Whether you are an auto repair shop, maintenance shop or related business, we welcome establishing long-term partnerships with you
